inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient can read and understand English

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient is HIV infected on stable ART regimen for 5 months or greater

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient has a Beck Depression Inventory score <16 and a documented HIV-1 RNA PCR <50 copies/mL

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: patient is able to give informed consent

notes: The patient has a history of type 2 diabetes in his family, but no personal history of allergies or medication use. He drinks around 60 units of alcohol per week and smokes 22 cigarettes per day.
